biotools.summary:
plastome assembly coverage visualization in R.


Visualizes the coverage depth of a complete plastid genome as well as the equality of its inverted repeat regions in relation to the circular, quadripartite genome structure and the location of individual genes.

bioschemas.name: PACVr
